title: An Integrated Approach to Immigrant Housing Search
details: A user-driven accommodation system, classifying based on preferences to optimize choice
Successfully implemented and displayed the locations on website using Reactjs and tailwindCSS.

title: Parkit : Smart parking application
details: Successfully able to achieved Parking space allocation and management of parking spaces.
Integrated with google maps for navigation.
The tech stack we used to develop this project are React Native , Redux, Computer vision, CNN, ,MongoDB

title: Psuedo Operating system
details: Successfully created a functional operating system model which process basic functionalities using C++
